title: Bobby Epstein on F1 and COTA’s future
description:
Laurence Edmondson is joined by Bobby Epstein to talk all things Circuit of the Americas, being a race promoter and what the future holds for the US Grand Prix.
(2:40) Adapting in 2020 without US GP
(6:30) 2022 onwards
(10:50) Value of permanent circuits
(18:31) F1 going forward

itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
